column4: hi, I've just done the distribution upgrade to jaunty and X doesn't work now. can anyone set me in the right direction to fix it?
if you cant get it to work pastebin your /var/log/Xorg.0.log and /etc/X11/xorg.conf file if you are using one
might just sudo mv /etc/X11/xorg.conf /etc/X11/xorg.conf-bak as a test and restart if you are using a file. x defaults to autodetect now so..
